reviews.review:
«CS GO» настолько хорош, что за процессом интересно наблюдать даже когда играет кто-то другой.

Поиграйте. Это просто шик.
Amazing game, put over 10,000 hours into it, phenomenal game!
игра прикольная, если играть на прайме + прямые руки
Honestly, theres nothing I'd suggest to fix. Maybe just anti cheats, but thats it.
moro, men jæ...... frustrerende av og til :):)
Jogo bom com uma comunidade extremamente podre, nao vale nem a pena se estressar ja que a valve ta cagando pra esses caras!
Все дауны мира заходят в одно время со мной
Cs go er et godt spil
I have spent a few hour on this game and it didn't disappoint too much.

Juego mal balanceado después de tantos años, los niveles están muy mal distribuidos, no hay opción de jugar con gente de tu región facilmente, hay que hacerlo de forma muy tosca, no me creo que con quienes juego a veces sean cuentas prime o seguras. Dinero tirado en el pasado por esta mierda de juego, pero aún sigo jugando porque los demás juegos son peores aún.

Раньше было лучше, слишком много читеров даже на прайме. Сделайте хороший АнтиЧит и будет приятнее играть

So I've had CSGO since I first downloaded steam in October 2015. It was the first game I bought and now, almost 5 years later, I still play this game probably more than any other game I have. I have amassed over 3500 hours and peaked at DMG in matchmaking, however most of my hours are probably spent in various community servers. I absolutely love this game and it definitely deserves its spot as one of the best and most competitive FPS games in the world. I absolutely recommend this game to anyone debating whether to get it or not, especially since it's free now!
Addictive game when playing deathmatch, Im poo at comp so cant comment on that, SO TOXIC tho.
